author: tyneslol
content: Hey <@211091239112671234> thank you for pushing an additional commit to the eip1153 branch, I was on holiday the last few days. Let me know if there is anything else that I can help out with on that branch and I'll be around to help with any issues if anything comes up. I'm going to look into getting it implemented in the execution specs next

author: holiman
content: Good! Yeah I just pushed some easy nits via github, but there are still some changes that are needed. Once those are done, I think it can be merged.

author: tyneslol
content: I pushed some more fixes, going to make the `dirtied()` change and double check that it doesn't break anything
